title: $(PackagesDir) is overridden in \build.props
body:
This assignment:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/dir.props#L41

is overridden by this (unintended?) assignment:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/dir.props#L78-L79

Which one should we delete?

nodes.body: This is probably no longer relevant.
